tag_list: venture-capital, angel-capital, strategy, startup, seed-capital, entrepreneurship, innovation
overview: Dan Cohen is a well-rounded, experienced business strategist with a deep background in several science and technology disciplines. Building on a solid career in information technology architecture, Dan spent 12 years providing high-level technical advice toFortune 100 clients, academia and government. With an outstanding track record of early innovation, trend spotting, disruptive approaches and creative strategies, Dan has been involved in more than forty businesses as a consultant, manager or entrepreneur. A seasoned consultant and manager, he has participated and presented at international conferences, standards bodies, professional development bodies and academic faculties. Most of Danâ€™s work is concentrated in areas where innovation has a tangible impact on the world in education, the environment, health care or sustainable development. Dan’s efforts these days are split between advising venture capital industry participants and his own startup ventures.
